name: Angelic Aspect, Lesser
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Champions of Purity © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text:
You take on an aspect of an angelic being, including some of its physical characteristics.

You gain low-light vision, resistance to acid 5, resistance to cold 5, and the benefits of protection from evil.
text_zh: 你拥有一部分天使的形态和其物理特性。你获得低光视觉，抗酸5，抗冷5和防护邪恶效果(protection from evil) 。
